Package com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.pathtracer

Class PathMesh

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.pathtracer.PathMesh
public class PathMesh extends Object
A collection of PathTriangles contained in an SpatialAccelerationStructure for optimized path tracing.
